title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations, 1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Transport (Tour Operators and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Transport (Tour Operators and 

Travel Agents) Act, 1982, (Disbursements from Fund) Regulations, 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited transport (tour operator travel agents) act 1982 (disbursements fund) regulation 2021

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations, 1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection with the virus SARS-CoV-2 
and specified as an infectious disease in accordance with Regulation 6 of, and 
the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations, 1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) 
or any variant of the disease so specified as an infectious disease in those 
Regulations; 

“refund credit note” means, subject to Regulation 4, any voucher, coupon or 
other document or instrument, including in electronic form, issued by a tour 
operator or travel agent to a customer in respect of the cancellation, due to Covid19, of an overseas travel contract. 

“the Fund” means the Travellers’ Protection Fund established under section 15 
of the Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) Act, 1982.
text_norm: 2 regulation - covid-19 mean disease caused infection virus sars-cov-2 specified infectious disease accordance regulation 6 schedule infectious disease regulation 1982 (s.i no 390 1981) variant disease specified infectious disease regulation refund credit note mean subject regulation 4 voucher coupon document instrument including electronic form issued tour operator travel agent customer respect cancellation due covid19 overseas travel contract fund mean traveller protection fund established section 15 transport (tour operator travel agents) act 1982

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations, 1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 3. Payments from the Fund may be made to a customer who holds a refund
text_raw:
3. Payments from the Fund may be made to a customer who holds a refund 
credit note where the tour operator or travel agent who issued the refund credit 
note is unable or fails to meet the financial or contractual obligations owed to 
the customer by the tour operator or travel agent pursuant to the refund credit 
note concerned.
text_norm: 3 payment fund may made customer hold refund credit note tour operator travel agent issued refund credit note unable fails meet financial contractual obligation owed customer tour operator travel agent pursuant refund credit note concerned

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations, 1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 4. A refund credit note is not a voucher, trading stamp or token within the
text_raw:
4. A refund credit note is not a voucher, trading stamp or token within the 
meaning of Regulation 15 of the Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) 
Act, 1982 (Claims by Customers) Regulations, 1983 (S.I. No.104 of 1983) and 
the said Regulation 15 shall not apply to a refund credit note.
text_norm: 4 refund credit note voucher trading stamp token within meaning regulation 15 transport (tour operator travel agents) act 1982 (claims customers) regulation 1983 (s.i no.104 1983) said regulation 15 shall apply refund credit note

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations, 1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 5. The Commission shall be the final arbiter on the admissibility of claims
text_raw:
5. The Commission shall be the final arbiter on the admissibility of claims 
in respect of payments from the Fund in respect of Refund Credit Notes for 
which the claimant is unable to provide adequate documentary proof.
text_norm: 5 commission shall final arbiter admissibility claim respect payment fund respect refund credit note claimant unable provide adequate documentary proof

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations, 1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 6. The Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) Act, 1982
text_raw:
6. The Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) Act, 1982 

(Disbursements from Fund) Regulations, 2020, are hereby revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [105] 3 

GIVEN under the seal of the Commission for Aviation Regulation, 

8 March, 2021. 

CATHY MANNION, 

Commissioner.
